contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Qatar Foundation’s Celebrations at Darb El-Saai

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Image 1: A child reads off a cue card live on QF Radio from Qatar Foundation’s Darb El Saai tent.

Image 2: Children participate in Sidra Medical and Research Center’s activity at Qatar Foundation’s Darb El Saai tent.

Image 3: A child participates in the flag guessing game presented by Georgetown University School of Foreign Service in Qatar at Darb El Saai.

Image 4: Qatar Foundation’s Darb El Saai tent visitors write a message to Qatar on the flag mural.

Image 5: Children show off their flag tattoos at Qatar Foundation’s Darb El Saai tent.

Image 6: Children watch the puppet show hosted by Qatar National Library at the Qatar Foundation Darb El Saai tent.

pageContext.title: Qatar Foundation’s Celebrations at Darb El-Saai
